channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Martínez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Trump touts economy, attacks political foes in State of the Union address
item.description: President Trump's State of the Union speech was a mix of the president touting his first-year record, slamming Democrats and creating made-for-TV moments.
item.content:encoded: President Trump's State of the Union speech was a mix of the president touting his first-year record, slamming Democrats and creating made-for-TV moments.
item.dc:creator: Franco Ordoñez

item.title: Voters share their reactions to Trump's State of the Union address
item.description: Voters from across the country respond to President Trump's State of the Union speech.
item.content:encoded: Voters from across the country respond to President Trump's State of the Union speech.
item.dc:creator: Hosts

item.title: Did Trump's State of the Union speech reach Independent voters ahead of the midterms?
item.description: NPR's Leila Fadel asks political consultant Frank Luntz whether President Trump positioned his administration and Republicans to reach Independent voters in his State of the Union address.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Leila Fadel asks political consultant Frank Luntz whether President Trump positioned his administration and Republicans to reach Independent voters in his State of the Union address.
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Trump touts economy, attacks political foes in State of the Union address, Trump tries to sell voters on his view of the economy, U.S. House rejects aviation safety bill.
item.content:encoded: Trump touts economy, attacks political foes in State of the Union address, Trump tries to sell voters on his view of the economy, U.S. House rejects aviation safety bill.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: 'Survivor' host Jeff Probst talks about reality competition's 50th season
item.description: Jeff Probst, the host of the reality competition show "Survivor," talks about its 50th season.
item.content:encoded: Jeff Probst, the host of the reality competition show "Survivor," talks about its 50th season.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Crashes raise concerns about pursuit rules for immigration agents
item.description: Federal agents are accused of using dangerous driving tactics during immigration enforcement. Their vehicle pursuits have been blamed for crashes and at least one death.
item.content:encoded:
Federal agents are accused of using dangerous driving tactics during immigration enforcement. Their vehicle pursuits have been blamed for crashes and at least one death.

(Image credit: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán)
item.dc:creator: Martin Kaste

item.title: American tourists in Mexico share their experience after cartel leader's death
item.description: Americans visiting a Mexican resort city share what they're seeing and experiencing following the killing of a powerful cartel leader.
item.content:encoded: Americans visiting a Mexican resort city share what they're seeing and experiencing following the killing of a powerful cartel leader.
item.dc:creator: Hosts

item.title: Oyster harvesting returns to parts of North Florida bay after hiatus
item.description: Parts of the Apalachicola Bay reopened for limited wild oyster harvesting after a five-year pause. Oyster eaters and fishermen are delighted.
item.content:encoded: Parts of the Apalachicola Bay reopened for limited wild oyster harvesting after a five-year pause. Oyster eaters and fishermen are delighted.
item.dc:creator: Regan McCarthy

item.title: FBI director's leadership questioned after partying with the US men's hockey team
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel sparked new criticism against his leadership of the bureau after he partied with the U.S. men's hockey team after their Olympic gold medal win.
item.content:encoded: FBI Director Kash Patel sparked new criticism against his leadership of the bureau after he partied with the U.S. men's hockey team after their Olympic gold medal win.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Lucas

item.title: Under new regulation, common pesticide would require 'prescription' for use
item.description: Neonicotinoids are widely used pesticides, but they kill bees and harm ecosystems. New rules would treat them more like controlled drugs, requiring something akin to a prescription for their use.
item.content:encoded: Neonicotinoids are widely used pesticides, but they kill bees and harm ecosystems. New rules would treat them more like controlled drugs, requiring something akin to a prescription for their use.
item.dc:creator: Rae Solomon
